description: Gets a list of FileSystemAssociationSummary objects. Each object contains a summary of a file system association. This operation is only supported for FSx File Gateways.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: If the request includes Marker, the response returns that value in this field.

nested_items.name: NextMarker
nested_items.description: If a value is present, there are more file system associations to return. In a subsequent request, use NextMarker as the value for Marker to retrieve the next set of file system associations.

nested_items.name: FileSystemAssociationSummaryList
nested_items.description: An array of information about the Amazon FSx gateway's file system associations.

nested_items.name: FileSystemAssociationId
nested_items.description: The ID of the file system association.

nested_items.name: FileSystemAssociationARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the file system association.

nested_items.name: FileSystemAssociationStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the file share. Valid Values: AVAILABLE | CREATING | DELETING | FORCE_DELETING | UPDATING | ERROR.

nested_items.name: GatewayARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the gateway. Use the  ListGateways operation to return a list of gateways for your account and Amazon Web Services Region.
